name: Yoga Studio
description: Experience tranquility and flexibility in our dedicated yoga studio, offering a serene environment for yoga practitioners of all levels.

name: Running Zone
description: Hit the ground running in our specialized area equipped with treadmills and space for cardio enthusiasts to pursue their running goals.

name: Protein Supplement Bar
description: Refuel and recover with our on-site protein supplement bar, providing a variety of supplements to support your fitness journey and optimize muscle recovery.

name: Bodybuilding Area
description: Sculpt and strengthen your physique in our designated bodybuilding zone, equipped with a range of weights and machines for targeted muscle development.

name: Musculation Zone
description: Elevate your strength and endurance through musculation exercises, fostering overall fitness and functional strength in a dedicated workout space.

name: Weightlifting Zone
description: Power up your training with our comprehensive weightlifting zone, featuring free weights and resistance machines to cater to various weightlifting routines and techniques.
